entry.title: Spooky? Is That You?
entry.summary:
Author: Deathpetal

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,819Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 98

Summary: “Spooky?” Green Lantern blurted out in surprise, so shocked he almost unmasked himself right then and there. Bruce didn’t know whether he should be happy the man had finally gotten a grasp on deductive thinking or mad that as a well known superhero he just admitted to knowing a civilian, and a famous one at that, in front of a reporter, effectively compromising both. There is a charity gala in Central City. As luck would have it, most of the Justice League founders’ civilian identities receive an invitation. They attend. When one of Flash’s rogues attacks, some secrets get revealed. In Hal’s defence he only did what Batman had been telling him to do and observed the details. It’s not his fault that the conclusion he arrived at was just so big.
